OOC: I replied to your original email about the character, saying I would back the idea. I said you need to talk with the rest of the Council as well though.
 
If there was a further email I missed I apologize. After my week of not being able to get online, I just deleated all the mails.

Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote:
O.k.:

1. Owlhawk is wandering around the Maximal base with
no clue what's going on.

2.  I deleted the e-mail telling me where Flicker was
(entirely my fault).

3.  Roborick has yet to respond to my e-mail proposing
a new character (sorry if I just missed it).

Would someone please help me out here?
